test.name: Test for Manadatory login/signup after 3 reads

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click on read story from 3 dot menu
Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: User should be able to login from the manadtory Login/Signup modal
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Manadatory login loader screen should appear
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Enter Vaild Password in password field
Click login button after entering password
Verify the notification for Successfully login
